titleStmt.title: His Majesties declaration to the ministers, free-holders, farmers, and substantiall copy-holders of the county of York assembled by His Majesties speciall summons at Haworth-Moor, near the city of York, on Friday the 3 of June, 1642.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted first at York and now re-printed at London for Edward Husbands,

notesStmt.note: This ed. differs from Wing C2284 found at reel 1611:38, in having only three lines in the header, and lacking the date (June 6) in colophon.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
